price: Уларни кўрганларида, анавилар ҳақиқий адашганлардир, дер эдилар.
arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَوۡهُمۡ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَضَآلُّونَ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā ra-awhum qālū inna hāulāi laḍāllūna
